授業方法:
As the course will provide actual experience of qualitative research via class and homework, and requires group work. Therefore the course will be conducted Face to Face(No Hybrid) and must physically attend. Test on Lecture 7 on Sept 23 would be conducted in the classroom only, so your physical attendance is MUST, otherwise you will get 0 score for the test.  Lecture 13-14 (Sept 27) will be online. On the Online lecture, Video should be on to show your face. Otherwise, your attendance will be recorded as "Absence". In the classroom, non-class related work is prohibited like on-offline chatting. If it is noticed that you are working on non-class related matter, your attendance will be recorded as "Absence". Individual, Group homework are required. As this is intensive course, the lead time for assignment would be quite short.
Finally, Please pay attention to time for classroom for Sept 23 (Lecture 7-10), which is different from normal Monday schedule. It will be Lecture 7: 13:20-15:00, Lecture 8: 15:00 - 16:40, Lecture 9: 17:10- 18:50, Lecture 10: 18:50 - 20:30.
